Comment: I think we all understand that Trump, Bondi, Rubio and this regime are going to use this situation to further their cause.  That will mean extensive use of resources to identify protesters, arrest and deportation of any non-Americans, prosecution of Americans, and sanctions against Columbia itself.  OK, and my assumption is those protesting understood these risks.  Standing up against an authoritarian regime is not without risk and that needs to be calculated into decision-making.   We need more of this kind of peaceful protesting.
